MediaStreamTrackEvent.summary: The MediaStreamTrackEvent interface of the {{domxref("Media Capture and Streams API", "", "", "nocode")}} represents events which indicate that a has had tracks added to or removed from the stream through calls to Media Capture and Streams API methods. These events are sent to the stream when these changes occur.

remarks.para: The events based on this interface are and .

-: and events
-
-Media Capture and Streams API

MediaStreamTrackEventTrack.summary: The track read-only property of the interface returns the associated with this event.

which represents an event signaling that a has been added to or removed from a .
